channel.title: lifestyle – Velvet Navy
channel.description: Relax in a world of velvet navy.

item.title: PMS Panel
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello and welcome to my PMS Panel! Here I will be discussing the ins and outs of hormones, cramps, spots, coping methods, cravings, and tips and tricks. I hope you take something from this and that it helps or comforts you in some way. Emotions: We all know that emotions, mood swings, and irritable feelings… Continue reading PMS Panel

item.title: Mindfulness
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Mindfulness is a brilliant way to wind down and remind yourself of the little things by bringing everything else into perspective. It is perfect for stress relief and a great positivity boost. It is often used as a therapeutic technique especially for people with anxiety. I am fairly new to actioning the concept of mindfulness… Continue reading Mindfulness

item.title: The little things that bring me happiness
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello again! Since i was MIA for quite a while between my previous post and the one before that, i though i’d do another post now to make up for it. So i am making a list of all the things that are making me happy right now, it’s a little bit like the ‘my favourites… Continue reading The little things that bring me happiness

item.title: My favourites recently
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello, this time i have decided to do my recent favourites, be sure to look around velvetnavy after reading this and take a look at my snapshots and social media sites which can be found on my about page. Anyway, enjoy:   Face masks It’s been so nice recently to just lay back and use… Continue reading My favourites recently

item.title: random tips, tricks and hacks
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello there, once again I am back with another blog post – shiny and new. My brother is a web designer and has very kindly made my blog much more professional for me so i hope you like the new look, not that it’s much different from the other. Anyway, on to the topic of this… Continue reading random tips, tricks and hacks

item.title: What I got for christmas 2016
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello again to anyone who kindly takes the time to read my blog, i am back for another post on the things i got for christmas. before i get into the presents i would just like to put out a disclaimer to say that i am in no way bragging or intending to brag i… Continue reading What I got for christmas 2016

item.title: autumn room!
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Once again I am back with another blog post although this one is at the start of a new season. Autumn! Which so happens to be my favourite season. The chilly weather, wrapping up warm, pretty autumnal pictures and colours, pumpkin spice, hot drinks and yummy candle smells.  Anyway, the point of this blog post… Continue reading autumn room!

item.title: The perfect summer
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: don’t stress yourself over having a perfect summer but do make sure you enjoy it! take as many opportunities as you can to have fun time and make good memories. here are a few things i did in the summer holidays: first of all i went to turkey with my family which was an incredible… Continue reading The perfect summer

item.title: tips to stay organised
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Tips to stay organised: If you have a lack of organisational skills or just need more order to your life, this one’s for you. Enjoy!   Keep a personal diary, one thing that makes me stressed out is holding in all my feelings especially after a bad day, it makes me feel very unorganised and… Continue reading tips to stay organised

item.title: My baby name book
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Though it may seem strange, considering I am far from motherhood and i am young, but I take a strong interest in names. This could be because of how unique my name is that I am so fond of unusual names but here are a few of my favourites: (note: my taste changes as i… Continue reading My baby name book
